data.name: TIME FOR YOU - VANESSA WALLPAPER PACK 01
data.detailed_description:
A high-quality wallpaper pack for your in-game phone featuring Vanessa!

Add more Vanessa into your life with the 4 in-game phone wallpapers included in this DLC. Fans of Vanessa will enjoy seeing her on their phones in the following attire:
1. Slinky 2021 dress
2. Christmas Cozy Clothes
3. Bunny Outift (As seen in Chapter 02)
4. High heels and nothing else


How to get the Wallpapers in-game?
The wallpapers from this DLC will automatically be added when you are in the Terminal Between Chapters, but you can also go to the DLC app on your in-game phone and then select "UNLOCK DLC".

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP or higher.
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c
  • Storage: 2 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo (64 bit only)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 2 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 2 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
This game is intended for adults only. There is explicit sexual content that some viewers may find offensive. The characters, story, and actions are fictitious and all characters are 18 and over.

Contains nudity, mature language, vaginal and non-penetrative sexual acts.
